get.description: This endpoint allows you to search for articles. You can search for articles by keyword, language, country, source, and more.

post.description: This endpoint allows you to search for articles. You can search for articles by keyword, language, country, source, and more.

get.description: This endpoint allows you to get latest headlines. You need to specify since when you want to get the latest headlines. You can also filter by language, country, source, and more.

post.description: This endpoint allows you to get latest headlines. You need to specify since when you want to get the latest headlines. You can also filter by language, country, source, and more.

get.description: This endpoint allows you to search for articles by author. You need to specify the author name. You can also filter by language, country, source, and more.

post.description: This endpoint allows you to search for articles by author. You need to specify the author name. You can also filter by language, country, source, and more.

get.summary: [Get] Search For Articles By Id Or Link
get.description: This endpoint allows you to search for articles. You can search for articles by id(s) or link(s).

post.description: This endpoint allows you to search for articles. You can search for articles by id(s) or link(s).

get.description: This endpoint returns a list of articles that are similar to the query provided. You also have the option to get similar articles for the results of a search.

post.description: This endpoint returns a list of articles that are similar to the query provided. You also have the option to get similar articles for the results of a search.

get.description: This endpoint allows you to get the list of sources that are available in the database. You can filter the sources by language and country. The maximum number of sources displayed is set according to your plan. You can find the list of plans and their features here: https://newscatcherapi.com/news-api#news-api-pricing

post.description: This endpoint allows you to get the list of sources that are available in the database. You can filter the sources by language and country. The maximum number of sources displayed is set according to your plan. You can find the list of plans and their features here: https://newscatcherapi.com/news-api#news-api-pricing

get.description: This endpoint allows you to get info about your subscription plan.

post.description: This endpoint allows you to get info about your subscription plan.
